alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 15 at 3:02PM MDT until August 15 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, including the following counties, in east central Colorado, Elbert. In northeast Colorado, Douglas. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 302 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elizabeth and Ponderosa Park.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
